name: Red and Blu
description:
You control two magnets, and your objective is to collect all the gems and get to the end of the level.

Controls

Click, drag and release to fire a magnet. If anything lands on a button, that color magnet will activate. There is a skip and restart button if a level is too challenging :)

Tools Used

  • Unity 2019.4
  • Photoshop
  • Stackoverflow :)

Credits

  • Music: Tri-Tachyon
  • Sounds: Kenney
